thread.title: Guess shares slide after model Upton's #metoo tweet

title: Guess shares slide after model Upton's #metoo tweet
text:
Guess shares slide after Kate Upton's #metoo tweet Thursday, February 01, 2018 - 01:00 
Guess shares fell more than 16 percent on Thursday following a tweet by model and actress Kate Upton about the company’s co-founder using the #MeToo hashtag designed to highlight sexual harassment.   
Guess shares fell more than 16 percent on Thursday following a tweet by model and actress Kate Upton about the company’s co-founder using the #MeToo hashtag designed to highlight sexual harassment.  //reut.rs/2DXJxJm
